events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
Customer issue identified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
Support agent Alice was assigned to handle the refund request case.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund for the incorrect order.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify?
The order number is 123456789, and I attached a picture showing the wrong item in the email.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund within 3 to 5 business days and you will receive a confirmation email.
I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the refund soon. Thanks for the help!
Your refund request has been approved and initiated. You should see the amount back on your payment method soon.
We are following up to confirm that your refund was received and your issue is fully resolved. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Closing this refund case now as it has been resolved to the customerâ€™s satisfaction.
